domain.game.contracts

Interface IGame

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IReadOnlyGame
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Game

    public interface IGame
extends IReadOnlyGame
    Represents a game with a corresponding IBoard, current Player and GameState.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void gameOver(Player winner)
      Sets the GameState to GameState.Finished and saves the winner.
      IBoard getBoard()
      Returns the IBoard this IGame is played on.
      void remise()
      Sets the GameState to GameState.Remise.
      void switchCurrentPlayer()
      Switch the current Player to his opponents.

      • Methods inherited from interface domain.game.contracts.IReadOnlyGame

        getCurrentPlayer, getGameState, getReadOnlyGame, getWinner, isOver

    • Method Detail

      • switchCurrentPlayer

        void switchCurrentPlayer()
        Switch the current Player to his opponents.

      • remise

        void remise()
        Sets the GameState to GameState.Remise.

      • gameOver

        void gameOver(Player winner)
        Sets the GameState to GameState.Finished and saves the winner.
        Parameters:
        winner - The Player who won the IGame.

      • getBoard

        IBoard getBoard()
        Returns the IBoard this IGame is played on.
        Specified by:
        getBoard in interface IReadOnlyGame
